Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Previous article Grand jury

In an interview with ABC news on the eve of the book's release, Donald Rumsfeld said,`` What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow.'' Donald Rumsfeld said, It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then, and added,`` Back then there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein] had these weapons.''

turned on to it,'' said NBA deputy commissioner Russ Granik , who was at Phil Jacksonadelphia's First Union Center on Wednesday night, when Allen Iverson scored 54 points to Vince Carter 's 28 in the 76ers' 97-92 victory. For better or worse, fans like it when you get superstars going against each other. People have been hearing about these guys for years now, but they haven't gotten this far before where they met each other at this level. That gets people interested. With the NBA's overall popularity declining and new rules designed to make the game more appealing set to take effect next season, an Allen Iverson-Vince Carter matchup is what the league really needed.`` Watching these two kids,

Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile.'' NBA's Most Valuable Player in 2001, agreed to a$ 4 million, two-year deal with Besiktas after no NBA team offered him a contract. Gary Moore said Allen Iverson last played Saturday. This is the most pain he's ever felt from any injury he's had, Gary Moore said.`` He's been in tremendous agony.'' Allen Iverson spent 10 seasons in Philadelphia before bouncing through Denver and Detroit, ending up in Memphis last season.

It comes after Downing St director of communications Andy Coulson quit amid allegations about phone hacking at the News of the World when he was editor. Labour deputy leader Harriet Harman , speaking on Sky News, said: Hacking into people's phones is illegal. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced.`` Nobody is above the law, no newspaper editor, no journalist.
